mdRecord.dcterms:title: Hammond's large scale war map of the Western Front ; Hammond's large scale war map Italian Front
Hammond's large scale war map Italian Front
War map Italian Front
War map of the Western Front
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: C.S. Hammond & Company.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: C. S. Hammond & Company (Incorporated) Engravers, Printers, Publishers 30 Church Street (Hudson Terminal)
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 68 x 91 cm. and 66 x 76 cm. on sheet 71 x 97 cm. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Both maps show battle lines as of Sept. 23rd, 1918.
Maps show railways, canals, forests, aircraft depots, wireless stations, forts, fortified towns, and naval arsenals, etc.
Possibly issued with an index, which is no longer present.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: on fragile paper with torn and chipped edges and some fold separations.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: World War, 1914-1918--Campaigns--Western Front--Maps.
